publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-5867 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Office of the Clerkâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, between 4 December 2010 and 31 January 2011, the Office of the Clerk will be open on all days except: Saturdays and Sundays, 24 (pm), 27, 28, 29, 30 and 31 December 2010, 3 and 4 January 2011.
